name: Captain Sabertooth: New Adventures
storyline: Heave ahoy! The King of the Sea smells gold! Join Captain Sabertooth and his most trusted men in sea battles and treasure hunts, in storms and hurricanes, with fun and games. Tully serves up rat soup! Are you ready for a dangerous voyage on The Dark Lady?
summary: A pirate game that will keep children occupied for hours, with challenges large and small in an exciting and varied universe.
